TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: Provides access to the designer options located on the **Tools** menu under the **Options** command in the Visual Studio development environment.

span.span: Provides access to the designer options located on the **Tools** menu under the **Options** command in the Visual Studio development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供的介面，可用來擷取和更新的 Windows Form 設計工具選項，所顯示的對話方塊中所列的值**選項**命令**工具**功能表Visual Studio 開發環境。 provides an interface that can be used to retrieve and update the values of the Windows Forms Designer options, which are listed within the dialog displayed by the **Options** command of the **Tools** menu of the Visual Studio development environment. 方法會擷取指定選項的值。The method retrieves the value of a specified option. 方法會設定指定的值，指定的選項。The method sets a specified value for a specified option. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取顯示標準的選項的目前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName) cil managed
Public Function GetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName);
abstract member GetOptionValue : string * string -> obj

param.name: pageName
param.span: The name of the page that defines the option.

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.

param.name: valueName
param.span: The name of the option property.

span.span: The name of the option property.

summary.span: Gets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.

span.span: Gets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.

returns.span: The value of the specified option.

span.span: The value of the specified option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`參數應該包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是不含任何空格字元的選項類別目錄名稱。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 類別名稱是通常 [一般的]。The category name is typically "General". 因此，您可以存取的英文頁面名稱"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的 [一般] 設計工具的選項分類。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 頁面和值的名稱應該是英文。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此下, 表可協助您存取您想要的選項。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指出英文的值名稱、 其資料格式，並說明每個：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |數值名稱Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每個方格的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每個方格的寬度。The width of each grid square. 此巢狀的屬性是唯讀時透過設計工具選項服務存取。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每個方格的高度。The height of each grid square. 此巢狀的屬性是唯讀時透過設計工具選項服務存取。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果應該顯示格線。`false`如果不應該顯示格線。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |貼齊格線SnapToGrid||`true` 如果元件的位置應該對齊格線。`false`如果位置不一定是對齊的方式。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用對齊線，或`SnapToGrid`要對齊方格中，控制項`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||`true` 若要允許的元件; 在建立時自動開啟的智慧標籤面板否則， `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 若要自動將方案的自訂控制項和元件透過**工具箱**，否則`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||`true` 如果已啟用元件快取。否則， `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用值的方法來查詢`GridSize`選項。The following code example demonstrates using the method to query for the value of the `GridSize` option. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`參數應該包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\C*ategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是不含任何空格字元的選項類別目錄名稱。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\C*ategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 類別名稱是通常 [一般的]。The category name is typically "General". 因此，您可以存取的英文頁面名稱"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的 [一般] 設計工具的選項分類。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 頁面和值的名稱應該是英文。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此下, 表可協助您存取您想要的選項。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指出英文的值名稱、 其資料格式，並說明每個：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |數值名稱Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每個方格的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每個方格的寬度。The width of each grid square. 此巢狀的屬性是唯讀時透過設計工具選項服務存取。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每個方格的高度。The height of each grid square. 此巢狀的屬性是唯讀時透過設計工具選項服務存取。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果應該顯示格線。`false`如果不應該顯示格線。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |貼齊格線SnapToGrid||`true` 如果元件的位置應該對齊格線。`false`如果位置不一定是對齊的方式。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用對齊線，或`SnapToGrid`要對齊方格中，控制項`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||`true` 若要允許的元件; 在建立時自動開啟的智慧標籤面板否則， `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 若要自動將方案的自訂控制項和元件透過**工具箱**，否則`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||`true` 如果已啟用元件快取。否則， `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.|
